Dating: CHRISTIAN PERIOD (not before); CHRISTIAN PERIOD; ISLAMIC PERIOD (not after)
Technique: ENGOBE; FORMED ON THE POTTER'S WHEEL
Name: Bowl
Description: Fragment of a bowl with a wide mouth, a flared rim, a semispherical body and a ring-shaped base with barely marked foot. Paste of a reddish colour and both interior and exterior surface covered with a coating of the same colour, while the coating on the rim is somewhat darker than that on the rest of the body.
